Alstonia Scholaris disease: Remove and destroy infected leaves and twigs, avoid overhead watering to keep foliage dry, improve air circulation by selective pruning, apply copper-based or mancozeb fungicide at first signs of leaf spot or blight.
Alstonia Scholaris healthy: Plant in well-drained soil with good spacing, prune regularly for open canopy, avoid waterlogging and overhead irrigation, clean up fallen leaves, monitor regularly for early pest/disease signs.
